data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Madriz, Nicaragua so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Madriz, Nicaragua
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 57,216 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 14 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Madriz, Nicaragua.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Madriz.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Madriz, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Over 3.82 percent of the people of Madriz are far from Jesus.
Father, remind your church in Madriz, Nicaragua that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Madriz.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

location.name: Madriz
location.cities_list: Somoto, San Juan de Río Coco, Palacagüina, Yalagüina, Totogalpa
location.cities_list_w_pop: Somoto (20,316), San Juan de Río Coco (3,820), Palacagüina (3,678), Yalagüina (2,265), Totogalpa (2,265)
